hypothesis_content.title: Post-News Memecoin Fade on Excessive Gap
hypothesis_content.statement: When a memecoin gaps up >15% at open (00:00 UTC) following significant news coverage, and fails to sustain >50% of the gap after 2 hours, price will mean-revert to fill >70% of the gap within the next 6 hours with volume declining sequentially.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Memecoins are particularly prone to news-driven overreactions. Gaps often get filled due to profit-taking and lack of sustained fundamental change. The 2-hour confirmation filters for weak momentum.
entry_conditions: Memecoin opens >15% above previous close (00:00 UTC)
News sentiment score > 0.7 (positive) in prior 6 hours
Price retraces >50% of gap within first 2 hours
2h volume shows declining trend from first to second candle

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price fills 70% of initial gap (measured from open)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Gap sustains or expands despite volume decline, or news catalyst proves more fundamental than anticipated.
